amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-76 to require the Attorney General to issue interim rules to implement this act 6 months after the date of enactment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (OH) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Miller (OH).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (OH) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
